messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
The ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack provides utility nodes to get directories right in ComfyUI.
How do I install the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
The custom node pack automatically installs when launched. If installation fails, the Directory Picker will not function properly. Refer to the documentation for instructions on manual installation.
List the nodes available in the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack.
The custom node pack includes nodes for directory selection, looping, and image fetching.
How does the 'Select Directory' node work?
The 'Select Directory' node opens a file browser to choose a directory. The selected directory is saved and accessible through an output string.
Explain the functionality of the 'Loopy Dir' node.
The 'Loopy Dir' node automatically loops through files in a directory. It can be used to process files in sequence or perform tasks based on each file.
Can you provide an example workflow using the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
The provided document includes a simple workflow demonstrating directory selection, looping, and image loading using the custom node pack.
Are there any known issues with the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
The document mentions an issue with directory selection on macOS after the first selection. This issue is not present on Windows.
